headline: CDW (NasdaqGS:CDW) Price Dips 11% in One Week Following Global Tariff Announcements
summary: CDW (NasdaqGS:CDW) experienced a price decline of 11% last week, possibly influenced by global tariff announcements that triggered a broad market sell-off, with the Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq each posting significant losses. The overall market fell 10%, largely due to escalating trade tensions and investor concerns about economic growth and inflation. While the downturn affected the technology sector and broader indices significantly, CDW's performance mirrored the broader market trends, as...
